      • addRoundEndListener

        public void addRoundEndListener(org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.events.EventHandler<RoundEnd> listener)
        Adds a round end event handler, triggered when the agent come back to the origin establishment.

        Triggered when the agent reaches the destination, but does not guarantee that the agent as re-entered the establishment (what will be its next action.

        Parameters:
        listener - round end listener
